comment: The result column represents the output of secadaptor == schnorr_extract_secadaptor()
extract secadaptor from a pre-signature whose first byte is 0x03
extract secadaptor from a pre-signature whose first byte is 0x02
extract secadaptor from bip340 signature created by adapting a pre-signature with negated s' value
extract secadaptor from bip340 signature created by adapting a pre-signature with negated R' value
